caption.p: (A) Concentration profile of RTV: A – as received, B – from CAP Adp 0.33, C – from CA 320S Seb, D – from CAP Adp 0.85, E – from CMCAB; (B) Release profile of EFV: A – as received, B – from CAP Adp 0.33, C – from CAP Adp 0.85, D – from CA 320S Seb, E – from CMCAB. The error bars represents standard deviation of results from 3 batches.
